p: Instead of traditional diagnosis and treatment, a new system should be developed. Simplification of the diagnostic and staging pathway has to be prioritized in order to reduce hospital visits and consequently the risk of contagion. Orthopedic is not a front-line subject, but fracture is a common injury, and most of the patients are in trouble when diagnosed during the epidemic [ 9, 10]. The regular diagnosis and treatment of patients were greatly affected, and elective surgical activity of the hospital was rapidly reduced.
